comments.body: Hey, I think I am pretty against this refactoring. There are multiple duplicated codes in R vectorization too (which I added). I didn't intentionally yet refactor those. Plus, I don't think it's good idea to have both refactoring and feature implementation in one PR.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +32,36 @@ * Base functionality for plans which execute grouped python udfs.
 */
abstract class BasePandasGroupExec(
    func: Expression,
    output: Seq[Attribute])
